name: MadWorld
overview: SPECTACULAR MAYHEM! Over-The-Top Madness. Wanna Play? Join Jack, a renegade contestant, in the world's deadliest game show, Deathwatch. Only the bloodiest, most creative tactics will help keep you alive in the ultimate fight for survival. • Visceral arcade-style gameplay. Fight your way out of impossible situations. • Hurl rivals into passing trains and trash cans. The environment is your arsenal. • Ultra-violent "Blood Bath Challenge" mini-games. Battle with a friend.
